comment.author: 38123137@N00
comment._content: Great shot! Do JOIN us. Support goodwill - tourism in Smithsonian Institute, etc, with this fine gazebo added to WILLIAM PHILLIPS [1825-1911] "ECO-CENTENARY 2011" - UK-IRELAND-ITALY: ADD1-3: AWARD-COMMENT 1. Born in London, Phillips visited Italy - met Garibaldi. He was later a much loved Municipal reformer-environmentalist, advocating free education plus gazebos for park concerts. and trees as 'community lungs'. A humanitarian, he campaigned for Lancashire’s disengaged cotton-workers, and as a J.P. of Galway, enlisted his family to get Famine Relief to starving cottagers. . . Be local volunteers, etc. * *Help source Italian-UK-Irish ECO-CENTENARY event-sites & eco-living SPONSORS. Develop cool EVENTS* * More on Phillips’ life, family, etc. - www.flickr.com/groups/1216134@N23/discuss/721576220144930.... We hope this eco-living festival will raise new social inspiration. Please OPEN *ALL SIZES* + Add tag: William-Phillips-Eco-Centenary-2011 * * Add me as CONTACT / FRIEND * * || * Thanks too for giving our group AWARDS - INVITING great images! * ||
